topic: Describe a law you would like to see introduced in your country
bullets: What the law would be about
How it would be enforced
Who would be most affected by it
Explain why you think this law is necessary

topic: Describe an ambition that you have not yet achieved
bullets: What the ambition is
Why you have not achieved it yet
What you need to do to achieve it
Explain how you feel about not having achieved it yet

topic: Describe a historical period you would like to know more about
bullets: What period it is
What happened during this time
Why you are interested in this specific period
Explain how you think life was different back then compared to now

topic: Describe a piece of technology that you find difficult to use
bullets: What the technology is
When you got it
Why you find it difficult to use
Explain how this technology could be improved

topic: Describe a time when you had to change your opinion about something
bullets: What the opinion was originally
Why you held that opinion
What made you change your mind
Explain how you feel about the new opinion now

topic: Describe a creative person whose work you admire
bullets: Who the person is
What kind of creative work they do
How you discovered their work
Explain why you think they are creative

topic: Describe a problem affecting your local community
bullets: What the problem is
How long it has been a problem
What has been done to solve it so far
Explain what you think should be done to solve it effectively

topic: Describe a decision you made that had a positive impact on your life
bullets: What the decision was
When you made it
What the alternatives were
Explain how exactly it improved your life
